item.title: That was the shortest press conference I...
item.description: That was the shortest press conference I've ever seen from Trump. I'm almost at a loss for words. It could have been even shorter if not for his repeated grievances about the Russia hoax. #Politics #NoPeace

item.title: I don't know, but to me it feels like Ch...
item.description: I don't know, but to me it feels like ChatGPT 5 is inferior to 4.1 or even 4.0 🤔. Lately, all the AIs seem to be exploding in dumbness 💥🤖. I think my Galen Erso reference from Rogue One 🌌 is coming true.

item.title: I'm working on creating a Homarr Dashboa...
item.description: I'm working on creating a Homarr Dashboard that resembles my Protopage homepage. 🖥️✨ I have a year to complete this project, as that’s when I plan to stop using Protopage. ⏳🚀

item.title: Happy Saturday! It looks like it's going...
item.description: Happy Saturday! It looks like it's going to be hot and rainy afternoon. It rained for almost 3 hours last night. Definitely in Florida's rainy season, which started a bit late this year. Typically, it kicks off in late May or early June. This year didn't begin until mid to late July.

item.title: Well, that minor flooding advisory defin...
item.description: Well, that minor flooding advisory definitely applies to my backyard. It’s not a street, but there’s definitely some minor flooding. 🌧️ Check it out here: https://alerts.weather.gov/id/urn:oid:2.49.0.1.840.0.4330dcd03c18570d86b40b7aa311eb9cda50365b.001.1 #weather #rain #yardflooding

item.title: Eventful day - but not for me. My parent...
item.description: Eventful day - but not for me. My parents asked my sister (across the street) to use her dryer. She said, “I’m using it.” They said, “You’re not home.” “Yes I am.” “Then where’s your car?” “Outside.” She looked - it was gone. Stolen. 🚗💨 I’ll update if it’s ever found!

item.title: It’s pouring outside right now 🌧️. This ...
item.description: It’s pouring outside right now 🌧️. This has been happening a lot this rainy season. Late-night showers, sometimes mid to late afternoon ☔. It’s helping with the heat at night 🌡️. Now there’s low, rolling, window-shaking thunder too ⛈️. #Florida #rainyseason #weather
